summary: User request, just a quick edit that adds a shouth to laugh like Malog Bal.
descriptionHtml:
Malog Bal Laugh

Just a quick edit based on a single user request that is already fullfilled, just sharing it.

[youtube]xQWYVxBW170[/youtube]

First Word: Laugh
Second Word: -
Third Word: Area fear, can kill low lvl targets

Unpack downloaded archive to ...|Skyrim|data|

Ingame open console (Key ^) and enter:
HELP BALLS (displays shout code)
PLAYER.ADDSHOUT CODE

HELP HAHA (displays word code)
PLAYER.TEACHWORD CODE

... and if you've got no dragon soul to unlock:
PLAYER.FORCEAV DRAGONSOULS 1

User request: [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1259486-molag-bals-laugh-power/]http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1259486-molag-bals-laugh-power/[/url]
author: Ghosu
